price: They said, “We have been sent to a wicked people[27],
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: [27] i.e., the people of the prophet Lot (عليه السلام).

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
